main.title: a gas station
main.body: a rusted metal structure, its roof caved in, is surrounded by dead trees. the glass windows are long gone. there's a faint smell of gas in the air. some boxes are nearby.

gas-station.title: a gas station
gas-station.body: the boxes turn out to be gas pumps. the sign reads "rancho oil." you try to activate one; despite your best efforts, no gas comes out. maybe something more useful is inside.

inside.title: inside
inside.body: the store is relatively intact. while the food and water is long gone, bullets of varying sizes line the shelves behind the counter.
